short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Space Count is known as the space bar clicker is an online tool to count the total number of clicks you have performed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool also tells about how many times have you hit the spacebar button in a particular time frame. Our amazing spacebar test tool is one of the best tools available over the internet. This tool is a fun game that serves you improve your hitting speed by practicing more.

Most commonly, a space bar tester is being used by enthusiastic pro gamers to check their button tapping speed. 

A faster button clicking speed help the gamer in various ways e.g. for shooting games like “Doom Eternal” it helps you hit and shoot your enemy quickly. 

In creative world-building games like Minecraft, gamers can build things more quickly, if they have faster button clicking speed.
